respStmt.resp: Added page beginnings and missing heads based on the facsimiles.

monogr.title: ديوان الرصافي
وهو مجموع ما نظمه الشاعر الاجتماعي الكبير معروف افندي الرصافي البغدادي
Dīwān al-Ruṣāfī
wa-huwwa majmūʿ mā naẓamahu al-shāʿir al-ijtimāʿī al-kabīr Maʿrūf Efendī al-Ruṣāfī al-Baghdādī

revisionDesc.tei:change: Added the xml:lang attribute to all nodes that lacked this attribute. The value is based on the closest ancestor.
revisionDesc.change: Added automated xml:ids for every element that is a descendant of tei:text and had no existing xml:id following the pattern "name()_generate-id()".
Add XIncludes to all qaṣāʾid published in al-Muqtabas.
Added automated xml:id s for every element that is a descendant of tei:text and had no existing xml:id following the pattern "name()_generate-id()".
revisionDesc.tei:change: Added references to local authority file ( ../data/tei/gazetteer_levant-phd.TEIP5.xml ) and to GeoNames IDs to placeName s without such references based on place s mentioned in the authority file.

Added references to local authority file ( ../data/tei/personography_OpenArabicPE.TEIP5.xml ) and VIAF to persName s without such references based on person s in the local authority file. If the source persName did not contain any further TEI mark-up, this has been added from the local authority file.

front.p: According to Ilyān Sarkīs, this first Dīwān of al-Ruṣāfī's qaṣāʾid was published in 1910. This claim is supported by an article in al-Muqtabas 4 (10) announcing the publication of the Dīwān. The latter claimed that, since al-Ruṣāfī had published many of his poems in al-Muqtabas, he had come to be known as "The Poet of al-Muqtabas" and that three fourths of the Dīwān had previously been published in al-Muqtabas. This claim is patently false. al-Muqtabas only published 26 qaṣāʾid of al-Ruṣāfī—all before his Dīwān was announced—and the Dīwān gathered some 100 of them.

div.head: امة الشرق او نحن في بغداد
جالينوس العرب او ابو بكر الرازي
اطلال العلم او المدرسة الظامية في بغداد
الجرائد و ما كانت عليه في الاستانة
راقم و ما ادراك ما راقم
